mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stained glass window and mosaic decoration on facade pilaster

The interiors and exteriors of the Frederick Ayer Mansion are rare survivals of designs by L.C. Tiffany remaining in situ. It is unusual in Tiffany's work in that it incorporates mosaics on its exterior as well as interior.-- from http://ayermansion.org/History.html [work]
